description: Philippine evergreen (Aglaonema commutatum) is truly an amazing plant for many reasons. It has a beautiful, glossy foliage that is decorated with silver brush strokes, giving it an eye-catching appearance. It is also considered one of the most versatile and easy-to-care-for houseplants. It grows quickly, is tolerant of low light, and surviving drought periods. Additionally, the Philippine evergreen is known to be an air-purifying plant, ridding the air of many harmful toxins. It provides a lush, jungle-like atmosphere to your home or office with minimal effort.
